You threw this trash, did not you?
That is a fine of five hundred Singapore dollars!
In Singapore, the law says you will be fined for littering!
I do not see anything here besides my own luggage.
Would you be so kind as to tell me what trash you are referring to?
Well, I will be going, then...
Hey, were not you going to go see your father?
Why do not you stop following us and get going?
I am meeting up with him in five days.
I can go wherever I want!
I am not taking orders from you guys.
She will be in danger if she stays with us.
Maybe she does not have any money.
I guess we can pay for her hotel room.
Polnareff, bring her, but do not hurt her pride.
We will pay for you, so come with us.
Well then, let us check in...
I am terribly sorry, but we are rather full at this time of year.
The rooms will not be next to each other.
Well, I guess we do not have a choice.
Avdol and I will share a room...
Jotaro and I will share a room, since we are both students.
That would mean the last room would be Polnareff and...
Like I would room with him!
Well, she is a child, but also a lady...
Could you make it four rooms?
I can relax more in my own room anyway!
We have been through hell since we left Hong Kong.
Let us hurry up and take a shower where it is safe.
I guess you guys are not going to give us a chance to rest...
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
That is some sharp killing intent you have got there.
Why do not you let me know your name
My Stand suggests the card called The Devil.
It evokes a curse's dark manipulations, deteriorating mental health,
and an inauspicious path of ruin and downfall.
How did you know I was in the fridge?
You took everything out of the fridge and
did not bother putting any of it away!
The ape we met the other day was a much more powerful
and terrifying Stand user than you.
N-Now you have done it, Polnareff!
How dare you do this to me?!
Now I can really hold a grudge against you!
Such painful agony must be avenged!
I let you find me and attack me on purpose!
I-I do not think I felt an attack...
No, I am sure I did not feel it.
A Stand user was hiding in my room!
I cannot tell if he is strong or weak...
He ran away... damn it, what the hell?
Do not let your guard down!
My leg's suddenly been cut open.
Soul Sacrifice, who suggests The Devil?
You are positive that is what he said?
But no matter how much I think, it still does not make sense.
I know for a fact that I saw a glimpse of his Stand.
But even though I do not remember an attack,
I will be there in five minutes.
Room 1212, on the twelfth floor, right?
Contact Kakyoin and Jotaro for me, too!
I hurt my leg a bit...
Could you bring up some kind of medicine and some bandages?
We will bring it up immediately.
I got hurt in the pants that I had not washed or even worn yet.
Do you know about the one who attacked Polnareff, Avdol?
An assassin who claims to be a Native American medicine man.
But he is a terrifying Stand user.
from all around the world hire him.
I have seen Soul Sacrifice once before.
and those wounds were all obtained
by provoking his enemy to attack.
He controls his Stand through the power of its grudge against that attacker.
That is why, to ordinary people, it seems like a curse killed the victims.
What kind of Stand does he use?
Everyone who meets him ends up killed.
Right now, it is dangerous to leave Polnareff alone.
So he might be able to pick us off, one by one...
He will be here in five minutes.
Everyone meet up in this room.
We will all meet up in room 1212, old man.
I cannot find my room key.
I could have sworn I set it here...
If I do not have my key, I will not be able to get back in here.
Could I just tell the front desk?
Is there a fine for that?
Must have fallen during all the commotion earlier.
Being trapped under the bed is not good!
Mr. Polnareff, this is room service.
I told you, you will be killed!
How dare you stab one of my eyes out, Polnareff?!
Your Stand is not one that can fight where you cannot see!
Do not leave this room for a while.
I will come for you again later.
Do not open the door to any stranger, got it?
How heavy is this bed, anyway?!
I have to use Silver Chariot to cut this cord...
As soon as I stop attacking, this happens.
Even if I cannot see, I am just going to have to keep stabbing away!
Looks like even a knight cannot cut open a watermelon
Well, we went to check on her...
But she is not a Stand user, so we thought that
we might be putting her in more danger by bringing her here.
It is already been way over five minutes.
I am going to snap your spear in half.
But a-at least I finally managed to cut the cord...
I need to return Chariot under the bed and get the hell out of here.
Wh-What the hell are you doing?!
I am going to bite your balls off now, man!
I am going to run off to a place you cannot see now.
Try giving the floor you are stuck to a good feel.
It is soaked with beer, juice, and alcohol!
If I could take a piss,
I would have done that to make it even more wet.
And now... what do you think I am going to do with this
short-circuiting hair dryer and that wet spot,
I am not going to dry you off!
This should take care of my grudge...
You are not the only one who is been scattering stuff around!
H-How did you know where I was on top of the bed...
So I can see the top of the bed really well from this angle.
I have a question for you.
I am looking for a man with two right arms.
How about you tell me who that guy's Stand is?
No assassin reveals their Stand's identity!
The only time they reveal it is when they or their opponent is dying!
With stupid Stand users like you guys who keep showing off your Stands,
we already know all your weak points!
If it were not for that mirror, I would have killed you by now!
Come at me one more time.
Did not you say you were going to bite off my balls or something?
Just try it, you vulgar little shit!
slice up everything except your balls!
It seems that you have been in the bathroom a long time.
We are going to get right to it.
Let us figure out what we are going to do if Soul Sacrifice attacks us.
Why was there a dead boy's body in your room?
And the dead body that was in the bathroom...
They are connected, are not they?!
I have the right to remain silent.
I have been waiting for you.
I had the Speedwagon Foundation take some measures.
Polnareff should be released soon enough.
To think that the enemy's pursuit would come so early...
As long as Dio's body is Jonathan Joestar's,
he will know about everything that Jotaro and I do.
That is why he keeps coming after us without a moment's rest.
But on the other hand, we are able to read Dio's thoughts, too.
I will go buy a Polaroid camera.
You do not have to do that.
I can create a spirit photo even without a camera.
This week's number three jumps up five points from last week...
The price of gold today is...
The channels seem to be changing chaotically.
It is trying to connect words from the TV into a sentence.
It is more spirit audio than spirit photo.
I am pretty sure I heard, There is a traitor among us...
you are watching, are not you?!
It is just as you heard.
It said quite clearly that Kakyoin is Dio's servant
and that he will betray us.
But if he is indeed communicating with Dio,
he could take our heads while we are sleeping at any time.
He would be Dio's Trojan Horse!
Are you going to eat that cherry?
Hey, what are you doing, Kakyoin?
Could he really be a traitor?
This is unforgivable, is not it?
